message.body: So I had the meeting and Mechelle said that she couldn't hire me right now but she would keep this in mind. Other highlights include her being "surprised" that I would propose being a writer. As though because I'm a visual artist, I'm not qualified to write.
Hahaha how do people do that? That subtle put-down that unbalances others? I need to learn how to do that because apparently all people w money do it
What a b
I'm sorry she said that to you
I doubt she will ever hire you tbh but I do think you'll find something else and I do think bonnie will start making $ soon
Sofie took the rest of the cards to massart w her and is putting them in undergrad art history places
And I will start writing up some drafts to galleries
Email drafts
To introduce our services
Please let me know what else I can do for you! I can email the art history chair from MICA and ask if she could suggest places for me to leave the cards too
I know her from thesis so it won't be weird

Thank you for the reassurance. Yeah, it was disappointing to meet with her again but you're right she is totally clueless. And of course I believe in Bonnie! Thank you for the 30 dollars btw that was cool haha
I will be way more invested in Bonnie once I get this job crap out of the way I promise
Emailing Mica's art history chair is perfect! Draft it up and I'll take a look to see if I can add anything
No worries
Take your time. You'll find a job soon. Don't worry
It's on Facebook not email
Ok great. I will check it out ASAP
ï¿¼
Sofies hanging them around campus haha
Haha! I will send pics of my efforts in bmore tomorrow too
